getPaint().Description: Gets the Paint object set to the current dim level.

Returns: A ColorFilterDimmer with the default dim color and levels.
Parameters: Context: A Context used to retrieve Resources.
createDefault(android.content.Context).Description: Creates a default ColorFilterDimmer. Uses the default color and level for the dimmer.

getColorFilter().Description: Gets the ColorFilter set to the current dim level.

Parameters: float: A float between 0 (fully dim) and 1 (fully active).
setActiveLevel(float).Description: Sets the active level of the dimmer. Updates the ColorFilter based on the level.

Parameters: View: The View to apply the ColorFilter to.
applyFilterToView(android.view.View).Description: Apply current the ColorFilter to a View. This method will set the hardware layer of the view when applying a filter, and remove it when not applying a filter.

ClassDesc: Helper class for applying a dim level to a View. The ColorFilterDimmer uses a ColorFilter in a Paint object to dim the view according to the currently active level.
